text: Stopwatch () is a 1970 Soviet drama movie directed by Rezo Esadze.НЕ СТАЛО ДРАМАТУРГА ЛЕОНИДА ЗОРИНАСекундомер It stars Nikolay Olyalin, Natalya Antonova, and Viktoriya Beskova. == Actors == * Nikolay Olyalin as Sergey Lavrov * Natalya Antonova as Natalya * Viktoriya Beskova as Vera * Liliya Aleshnikova as Tamara (as L. Aleshnikova) * Irina Kuberskaya as Asya (as I. Kuberskaya) * Olga Gasparova as Nina (as O. Kobelyeva) == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Soviet movies Category:1970 movies Category:Soviet drama movies
title: Stopwatch (movie)
